name: Gift of Parthax
description: Gift of Parthax is a 2D top-down action-arena game of gladiatorial wizardry! Customize your arsenal of countless spells, duel the masters of the arena with their mythological beasts, and rescue your friend Veleus from the powerful mage, Parthax!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.66 GHz Dual core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 5000 or newer DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core 2.0 (or higher) Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 660 or better / ATI 7950 or better DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Yes
